info.title: MyHome.NG
info.description: The MyHome.ng project is a web application designed to streamline the process of finding, renting, and managing properties.

post.description: Register a new user with the provided information.
Authenticate a user with the provided email and password
Logout a user and revoke the access token

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID of the user to be deleted

post.summary: Send a verification code to the user's email
post.description: Sends a verification code to the user's email for verification purposes.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID of the user to receive the verification code

post.summary: Verify the user's email using the verification code
post.description: Verifies the user's email by checking the verification code.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user to be verified

parameters.name: verification_code
parameters.description: Verification code sent to the user's email

post.summary: Start a chat with an agent
post.description: Start a chat with an agent about a product

get.summary: Get all chats for the authenticated user
get.description: Get all chats for the authenticated user

post.summary: Send a message in a chat
post.description: Send a message to an agent in a chat

message.example: Hello, I am interested in this property......

get.summary: Get a specific chat by ID for the authenticated user
get.description: Retrieve a specific chat by ID. Includes details of both the tenant and the agent involved in the chat.

parameters.name: chatId
parameters.description: ID of the chat to retrieve

Retrieve details of a product by its ID.

post.description: Add or remove a bookmark for the specified product.

parameters.description: ID of the product to bookmark or unbookmark
